48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Huraira that:Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) used to seek refuge (in Allah) from the evil of what has been decreed, from misery, from the mockery of (triumphant) enemies, and from severe calamity. `Amr (one of the narrators) said in his narration: "Sufyan said: 'I fear I may have added one of them (the phrases)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي التَّعَوُّذِ مِنْ سُوءِ الْقَضَاءِ وَدَرَكِ الشَّقَاءِ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge From A Bad End, And Misery Etc
